info.+content: After winning a fierce battle against Yosen High, Seirin High basketball team successfully advanced on the semifinals of the Winter Cup. They continue aiming to become the champion but this makes hard for them since they're against powerful opponents.

title.+content: I'm Just Going At Full Strength
Don't You Get In My Way
In my own way, I'm desperate
